alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 3:24AM MST until December 02 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 15 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact peak travel times through Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
